profileText: a Representative from Indiana; born in Nosivka, Chernihiv Oblast, Ukraine, October 6, 1978; B.S., National University of Economics, Kyiv, Ukraine; M.B.A., National University of Economics, Kyiv, Ukraine, 2000; M.P.A, Indiana University Kelley School of Business, Bloomington, Ind. 2006; financial executive; business owner; farmer; professor, Indiana University Kelley School of Business, 2013–2020; staff, Office of the Attorney General, State of Indiana; member of the Indiana state senate, 2017–2020; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2021–present).
